"Koffie": "<%me>, good work. This is the administrator, Koffie."
"This is not a communication for a new mission, more of a warning."
"Recently, a certain Arks team has been incomprehensibly attacking other Arks."
"Why this is occurring has been yet to be made clear, but for now we are warning all Arks members."
"<%me>, there is a chance that you could be targeted, so be on your guard."
